message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your enthusiasm, but $150 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go.  Would you be open to $110?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand where you're coming from, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. However, $135 is still a little steep for me. I'm willing to go up to $125. What do you think?
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $125 and my previous offer of $135. How about $130?
Alice,  I appreciate you coming down in price, but $130 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm willing to go up to $128.  This is my final offer.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $132. I'm getting a bit concerned that if we don't meet at this price, I might have to consider other offers. What do you think?
